meanings.definition: A type of cheese made from whey
meanings.sent1: I used ricottas to make a delicious lasagna for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on ricottas, so I bought a few containers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the ricottas, causing a cheesy mess on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm plate of ricottas on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of ricottas melted in my mouth, leaving a savory taste behind.
